article_title: Health system tracks community health in real-time
article_text: Thirteen public hospital districts in rural Eastern Washington have adopted an innovative technology solution that gives providers real-time data on patients with chronic conditions. The system not only promotes better care coordination, but positions the providers for the shift to value.

article_metadata.description: NorthShore University HealthSystem is pioneering an initiative to track occurrences of such things as the flu in the broader community. The goal is to arm clinicians with real-time data to make more informed treatment decisions.

article_metadata.keywords: electronic health record, big data, data analytics, population health, disease outbreak

article_summary:
Thirteen public hospital districts in rural Eastern Washington have adopted an innovative technology solution that gives providers real-time data on patients with chronic conditions.
The system not only promotes better care coordination, but positions the providers for the shift to value.
